text: CT CHEST WITH CONTRAST: Cavitary mass in RLL (4.6 x 3.8 cm). Right hilar mass causing RUL bronchial obstruction. Trace right pleural effusion. Small GGO in RUL. Minimal basilar atelectasis. 6 mm LUL nodule, 5 mm LLL nodule. No devices. No pericardial effusion.
MRI BRAIN W/WO: Rim-enhancing right frontal lesion with vasogenic edema. 5 mm midline shift. No acute infarct. No hydrocephalus. Suggests metastasis.
CT A/P: Hepatic hypodense lesions compatible with metastases. No biliary dilatation. Mild ascites. No bowel obstruction.
